headline: Dave Ramsey Prefers His Dog To Most People, But He's Clear On One Thing—You Don't Go '$14,000 In Debt To Put New Hips In A Labrador'
summary: Dave Ramsey says he genuinely loves his dog more than most people. In a recent post on X, the personal finance expert shared, “I’ve got a little Havanese bear dog, it’s 12 pounds. I truly prefer this dog to most people, I really do.” Loving Dogs Doesn't Mean Losing Common Sense I LOVE my dog. Honestly, I prefer him to most people. So I get it. Saying goodbye is brutal. pic.twitter.com/dmTCQ3rpa9 — Dave Ramsey (@DaveRamsey) June 5, 2025 Don't Miss: Maker of the $60,000 foldable home has 3 factory
